tests.name: expr-1.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr basic addition
puts [expr {1 + 2}]
puts [expr {10 + 20}]
puts [expr {0 + 0}]
puts [expr {-5 + 3}]
puts [expr {100 + -50}]

tests.name: expr-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr basic subtraction
puts [expr {5 - 3}]
puts [expr {10 - 20}]
puts [expr {0 - 0}]
puts [expr {-5 - 3}]
puts [expr {100 - -50}]

tests.name: expr-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr basic multiplication
puts [expr {3 * 4}]
puts [expr {10 * 0}]
puts [expr {-5 * 3}]
puts [expr {-5 * -3}]
puts [expr {7 * 1}]

tests.name: expr-1.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr basic division
puts [expr {10 / 2}]
puts [expr {7 / 2}]
puts [expr {0 / 5}]
puts [expr {-10 / 3}]
puts [expr {10 / -3}]

tests.name: expr-1.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr floating point arithmetic
puts [expr {1.5 + 2.5}]
puts [expr {10.0 / 4}]
puts [expr {5 / 2.0}]
puts [expr {3.14 * 2}]
puts [expr {10.5 - 0.5}]

tests.name: expr-1.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr remainder (modulo)
puts [expr {10 % 3}]
puts [expr {10 % 5}]
puts [expr {-7 % 3}]
puts [expr {7 % -3}]
puts [expr {-7 % -3}]

tests.name: expr-10.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr division by zero (integer)
catch {expr {1 / 0}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr modulo by zero
catch {expr {10 % 0}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr division by zero (float returns Inf)
puts [expr {1.0 / 0}]
puts [expr {-1.0 / 0}]

tests.name: expr-10.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr missing operand
catch {expr {1 +}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr unbalanced parentheses (missing close)
catch {expr {(1 + 2}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr unbalanced parentheses (extra close)
catch {expr {1 + 2)}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.6
tests.script:
# Test: expr invalid operator
catch {expr {1 @ 2}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-10.7
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise on non-integer
catch {expr {1.5 & 2}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "1.5" as left operand of "&"

tests.name: expr-10.8
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise NOT on non-integer
catch {expr {~1.5}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "1.5" as operand of "~"

tests.name: expr-10.9
tests.script:
# Test: expr no arguments
catch {expr} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr undefined variable
catch {expr {$undefined_var + 1}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr shift on non-integer
catch {expr {1.5 << 2}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "1.5" as left operand of "<<"

tests.name: expr-11.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr incomplete ternary
catch {expr {1 ? 2}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr invalid string as number
catch {expr {"abc" + 1}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use non-numeric string "abc" as left operand of "+"

tests.name: expr-11.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr empty expression
catch {expr {}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr consecutive operators
catch {expr {1 + + 2}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.6
tests.script:
# Test: expr leading operator (except unary)
catch {expr {* 2}} result
puts $result

tests.name: expr-11.7
tests.script:
# Test: expr modulo on float
catch {expr {5.5 % 2}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "5.5" as left operand of "%"

tests.name: expr-11.8
tests.script:
# Test: expr XOR on non-integer
catch {expr {1.5 ^ 2}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "1.5" as left operand of "^"

tests.name: expr-11.9
tests.script:
# Test: expr OR on non-integer
catch {expr {1.5 | 2}} result
puts $result
tests.stdout: cannot use floating-point value "1.5" as left operand of "|"

tests.name: expr-2.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr exponentiation
puts [expr {2 ** 3}]
puts [expr {2 ** 0}]
puts [expr {2 ** 10}]
puts [expr {3 ** 3}]
puts [expr {10 ** 2}]

tests.name: expr-2.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr unary operators
puts [expr {-5}]
puts [expr {+5}]
puts [expr {--5}]
puts [expr {-(-5)}]
puts [expr {!0}]
puts [expr {!1}]
puts [expr {!5}]

tests.name: expr-2.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise NOT
puts [expr {~0}]
puts [expr {~1}]
puts [expr {~-1}]
puts [expr {~255}]

tests.name: expr-2.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr exponentiation right-to-left associativity
puts [expr {2 ** 3 ** 2}]
puts [expr {(2 ** 3) ** 2}]
puts [expr {2 ** (3 ** 2)}]

tests.name: expr-3.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr less than
puts [expr {1 < 2}]
puts [expr {2 < 1}]
puts [expr {2 < 2}]
puts [expr {-5 < 0}]
puts [expr {1.5 < 2.5}]

tests.name: expr-3.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr greater than
puts [expr {2 > 1}]
puts [expr {1 > 2}]
puts [expr {2 > 2}]
puts [expr {0 > -5}]
puts [expr {2.5 > 1.5}]

tests.name: expr-3.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr less than or equal
puts [expr {1 <= 2}]
puts [expr {2 <= 1}]
puts [expr {2 <= 2}]
puts [expr {-5 <= 0}]
puts [expr {1.5 <= 1.5}]

tests.name: expr-3.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr greater than or equal
puts [expr {2 >= 1}]
puts [expr {1 >= 2}]
puts [expr {2 >= 2}]
puts [expr {0 >= -5}]
puts [expr {1.5 >= 1.5}]

tests.name: expr-3.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr equal
puts [expr {1 == 1}]
puts [expr {1 == 2}]
puts [expr {0 == 0}]
puts [expr {-5 == -5}]
puts [expr {1.5 == 1.5}]
puts [expr {1 == 1.0}]

tests.name: expr-3.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr not equal
puts [expr {1 != 2}]
puts [expr {1 != 1}]
puts [expr {0 != 0}]
puts [expr {-5 != 5}]
puts [expr {1.5 != 1.6}]

tests.name: expr-4.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr logical AND
puts [expr {1 && 1}]
puts [expr {1 && 0}]
puts [expr {0 && 1}]
puts [expr {0 && 0}]
puts [expr {5 && 3}]

tests.name: expr-4.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr logical OR
puts [expr {1 || 1}]
puts [expr {1 || 0}]
puts [expr {0 || 1}]
puts [expr {0 || 0}]
puts [expr {5 || 0}]

tests.name: expr-4.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise AND
puts [expr {0xFF & 0x0F}]
puts [expr {7 & 3}]
puts [expr {12 & 10}]
puts [expr {0 & 255}]

tests.name: expr-4.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise OR
puts [expr {0xF0 | 0x0F}]
puts [expr {4 | 2}]
puts [expr {12 | 10}]
puts [expr {0 | 255}]

tests.name: expr-4.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr bitwise XOR
puts [expr {0xFF ^ 0x0F}]
puts [expr {7 ^ 3}]
puts [expr {12 ^ 10}]
puts [expr {5 ^ 5}]

tests.name: expr-4.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr left shift
puts [expr {1 << 0}]
puts [expr {1 << 1}]
puts [expr {1 << 4}]
puts [expr {5 << 2}]

tests.name: expr-4.6
tests.script:
# Test: expr right shift
puts [expr {16 >> 0}]
puts [expr {16 >> 1}]
puts [expr {16 >> 4}]
puts [expr {20 >> 2}]
puts [expr {-16 >> 2}]

tests.name: expr-5.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr string equal (eq)
puts [expr {"abc" eq "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abc" eq "def"}]
puts [expr {"" eq ""}]
puts [expr {"hello" eq "Hello"}]

tests.name: expr-5.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr string not equal (ne)
puts [expr {"abc" ne "def"}]
puts [expr {"abc" ne "abc"}]
puts [expr {"" ne "x"}]
puts [expr {"hello" ne "Hello"}]

tests.name: expr-5.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr string less than (lt)
puts [expr {"abc" lt "abd"}]
puts [expr {"abc" lt "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abc" lt "abb"}]
puts [expr {"A" lt "a"}]

tests.name: expr-5.3
tests.script:
# Test: expr string greater than (gt)
puts [expr {"abd" gt "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abc" gt "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abb" gt "abc"}]
puts [expr {"a" gt "A"}]

tests.name: expr-5.4
tests.script:
# Test: expr string less than or equal (le)
puts [expr {"abc" le "abd"}]
puts [expr {"abc" le "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abc" le "abb"}]

tests.name: expr-5.5
tests.script:
# Test: expr string greater than or equal (ge)
puts [expr {"abd" ge "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abc" ge "abc"}]
puts [expr {"abb" ge "abc"}]

tests.name: expr-5.6
tests.script:
# Test: expr list containment (in)
puts [expr {"a" in {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"d" in {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"" in {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"b" in {a b c}}]

tests.name: expr-5.7
tests.script:
# Test: expr list non-containment (ni)
puts [expr {"d" ni {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"a" ni {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"" ni {a b c}}]
puts [expr {"x" ni {}}]

tests.name: expr-6.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr ternary operator
puts [expr {1 ? "yes" : "no"}]
puts [expr {0 ? "yes" : "no"}]
puts [expr {5 > 3 ? "greater" : "less"}]
puts [expr {2 < 1 ? "true" : "false"}]

tests.name: expr-6.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr ternary with numeric results
puts [expr {1 ? 10 : 20}]
puts [expr {0 ? 10 : 20}]
puts [expr {5 > 3 ? 100 : 0}]

tests.name: expr-6.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr nested ternary
puts [expr {1 ? (2 ? "a" : "b") : "c"}]
puts [expr {0 ? "a" : (1 ? "b" : "c")}]

tests.name: expr-7.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr parentheses and precedence
puts [expr {2 + 3 * 4}]
puts [expr {(2 + 3) * 4}]
puts [expr {10 - 4 - 2}]
puts [expr {10 - (4 - 2)}]

tests.name: expr-7.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr operator precedence (comparison vs arithmetic)
puts [expr {4 * 2 < 7}]
puts [expr {4 * 2 < 9}]
puts [expr {2 + 3 == 5}]
puts [expr {2 + 3 == 4}]

tests.name: expr-7.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr complex precedence
puts [expr {1 + 2 * 3 - 4 / 2}]
puts [expr {(1 + 2) * (3 - 4) / 2}]
puts [expr {5 & 3 | 2}]
puts [expr {(5 & 3) | 2}]

tests.name: expr-8.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr hexadecimal numbers
puts [expr {0xFF}]
puts [expr {0x10}]
puts [expr {0xff + 0x01}]
puts [expr {0xAB == 171}]

tests.name: expr-8.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr binary and octal numbers
puts [expr {0b1010}]
puts [expr {0b1111}]
puts [expr {0o17}]
puts [expr {0o10}]

tests.name: expr-8.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr scientific notation
puts [expr {1e2}]
puts [expr {1.5e3}]
puts [expr {2.5E-1}]
puts [expr {1e0}]

tests.name: expr-9.0
tests.script:
# Test: expr variable substitution
set a 5
set b 3
puts [expr {$a + $b}]
puts [expr {$a * $b}]
puts [expr {$a - $b}]
puts [expr {$a / $b}]

tests.name: expr-9.1
tests.script:
# Test: expr variable in comparison
set x 10
set y 20
puts [expr {$x < $y}]
puts [expr {$x == $y}]
puts [expr {$x != $y}]
puts [expr {$x >= 10}]

tests.name: expr-9.2
tests.script:
# Test: expr command substitution
puts [expr {[string length "hello"] + 1}]
puts [expr {[llength {a b c}] * 2}]
puts [expr {[expr {2 + 3}] * 2}]
